properties.name: camel.component.azure-storage-datalake.account-key
properties.description: account key for authentication

properties.name: camel.component.azure-storage-datalake.autowired-enabled
properties.description: Whether autowiring is enabled. This is used for automatic autowiring options (the option must be marked as autowired) by looking up in the registry to find if there is a single instance of matching type, which then gets configured on the component. This can be used for automatic configuring JDBC data sources, JMS connection factories, AWS Clients, etc.

properties.name: camel.component.azure-storage-datalake.bridge-error-handler
properties.description: Allows for bridging the consumer to the Camel routing Error Handler, which mean any exceptions occurred while the consumer is trying to pickup incoming messages, or the likes, will now be processed as a message and handled by the routing Error Handler. By default the consumer will use the org.apache.camel.spi.ExceptionHandler to deal with exceptions, that will be logged at WARN or ERROR level and ignored.

properties.name: camel.component.azure-storage-datalake.client-id
properties.description: client id for azure account

properties.name: camel.component.azure-storage-datalake.client-secret
properties.description: client secret for azure account

properties.name: camel.component.azure-storage-datalake.client-secret-credential
properties.description: client secret credential for authentication. The option is a com.azure.identity.ClientSecretCredential type.

properties.name: camel.component.azure-storage-datalake.close
properties.description: Whether or not a file changed event raised indicates completion (true) or modification (false)

properties.name: camel.component.azure-storage-datalake.close-stream-after-read
properties.description: check for closing stream after read

properties.name: camel.component.azure-storage-datalake.configuration
properties.description: configuration object for datalake. The option is a org.apache.camel.component.azure.storage.datalake.DataLakeConfiguration type.

properties.name: camel.component.azure-storage-datalake.data-count
properties.description: count number of bytes to download

properties.name: camel.component.azure-storage-datalake.directory-name
properties.description: directory of the file to be handled in component

properties.name: camel.component.azure-storage-datalake.download-link-expiration
properties.description: download link expiration time

properties.name: camel.component.azure-storage-datalake.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable auto configuration of the azure-storage-datalake component. This is enabled by default.

properties.name: camel.component.azure-storage-datalake.expression
properties.description: expression for queryInputStream

properties.name: camel.component.azure-storage-datalake.file-dir
properties.description: directory of file to do operations in the local system

properties.name: camel.component.azure-storage-datalake.file-name
properties.description: name of file to be handled in component

properties.name: camel.component.azure-storage-datalake.file-offset
properties.description: offset position in file for different operations

properties.name: camel.component.azure-storage-datalake.lazy-start-producer
properties.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

properties.name: camel.component.azure-storage-datalake.max-results
properties.description: maximum number of results to show at a time

properties.name: camel.component.azure-storage-datalake.max-retry-requests
properties.description: no of retries to a given request

properties.name: camel.component.azure-storage-datalake.open-options
properties.description: set open options for creating file

properties.name: camel.component.azure-storage-datalake.operation
properties.description: operation to be performed

properties.name: camel.component.azure-storage-datalake.path
properties.description: path in azure datalake for operations

properties.name: camel.component.azure-storage-datalake.permission
properties.description: permission string for the file

properties.name: camel.component.azure-storage-datalake.position
properties.description: This parameter allows the caller to upload data in parallel and control the order in which it is appended to the file.

properties.name: camel.component.azure-storage-datalake.recursive
properties.description: recursively include all paths

properties.name: camel.component.azure-storage-datalake.regex
properties.description: regular expression for matching file names

properties.name: camel.component.azure-storage-datalake.retain-uncommited-data
properties.description: Whether or not uncommitted data is to be retained after the operation

properties.name: camel.component.azure-storage-datalake.sas-credential
properties.description: SAS token credential. The option is a com.azure.core.credential.AzureSasCredential type.

properties.name: camel.component.azure-storage-datalake.sas-signature
properties.description: SAS token signature

properties.name: camel.component.azure-storage-datalake.service-client
properties.description: datalake service client for azure storage datalake. The option is a com.azure.storage.file.datalake.DataLakeServiceClient type.

properties.name: camel.component.azure-storage-datalake.shared-key-credential
properties.description: shared key credential for azure datalake gen2. The option is a com.azure.storage.common.StorageSharedKeyCredential type.

properties.name: camel.component.azure-storage-datalake.tenant-id
properties.description: tenant id for azure account

properties.name: camel.component.azure-storage-datalake.timeout
properties.description: Timeout for operation. The option is a java.time.Duration type.

properties.name: camel.component.azure-storage-datalake.umask
properties.description: umask permission for file

properties.name: camel.component.azure-storage-datalake.use-default-identity
properties.description: Use default identity

properties.name: camel.component.azure-storage-datalake.user-principal-name-returned
properties.description: whether or not to use upn
